snippet: Capping another season on fashion parties, Carine Roitfeld celebrated the latest issue of CR Fashion Book at a glamorous soiree.
lead_paragraph: Capping another season on fashion parties, Carine Roitfeld celebrated the latest issue of CR Fashion Book at a glamorous soiree.

headline.main: At CR Fashion Party, Justin Bieber, Karl Lagerfeld and the Kardashians Mingle
